page.title: 18INTERVIEW WITH OUR POLICEMAN
page.content: PC Morrison lives in Frant and he is sort of a partner with PC White in Eridge.He said that there aren't many crimes in this area.He thinks that Frant is a nice place to live in. If PC White is off ill or something PC Morrison might take over or the other way round. He doesn't go to the police station he does his work at home in his office and if he needs to go out on pratrol he has his police car parked outside his house. He can wear uniform or normal clothes but PC Morrison wears uniform because in the daytime he can be seen if somebody wants help and in the nightime he can't be seen so he can follow criminals without being seen. Mr Morrison likes helping people in his job as most policeman do.
